metadata.title: CVE-2021-47474 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: comedi:vmk80xx: fix bulk-buffer overflow The driver is using endpoint-sizedbuffers but must not assume that the tx and rx buffers are of equal size ora malicious device could overflow the slab-allocated receive buffer whendoing bulk transfers.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
